sentences.en: " I know the human being and fish can coexist peacefully. "
sentences.cn: “ 我知道人类与鱼类可以和平共存. ”

sentences.en: A heart of light and a soul of darkness cannot coexist.
sentences.cn: 光明之星与黑暗之魂永不共存.

sentences.en: A violent temper cannot coexist with a love of peace.
sentences.cn: 暴躁的脾气与爱好平静是无法共存的.

sentences.en: All of your data can coexist in the same database.
sentences.cn: 你所有的数据都可以在相同的数据库中共存。

sentences.en: All will coexist with existing token - ring equipment and the token - passing access protocol.
sentences.cn: 所有这些将与 令牌环 网设备和令牌传递访问协议并存.

sentences.en: At present, the opportunity and difficulty coexist in the development of hydropower.
sentences.cn: 当前发展水电的机遇与困难并存.

sentences.en: But I think both can coexist.
sentences.cn: 但是我认为两者可以共存。

sentences.en: In fact, both do coexist.
sentences.cn: 事实上，两者是共存的。

sentences.en: In some cases the public estates coexist with private markets and influence their price through competition.
sentences.cn: 有时,公共集团与私营市场并存,通过竞争对价格施加影响.

sentences.en: Let green and we coexist!
sentences.cn: 让绿色与我们共存！

sentences.en: Love and hate coexist in every trivial affair.
sentences.cn: 每一件细碎琐事都充塞着这般爱恨和矛盾交缠.

sentences.en: Never the less, the limitation and superiority of digitalization coexist.
sentences.cn: 然而数字化的局限性和优越性同时产生,并客观存在.

sentences.en: Pockets of affluence coexist with poverty.
sentences.cn: 少数富裕地区与贫困地区并存。

sentences.en: Polymers are usually semi - crystalline materials in which crystalline and amorphous domains coexist.
sentences.cn: 聚合物材料多为半晶态,晶畴和非晶畴共存.

sentences.en: The mentality and the success coexist, the success and wealth is twinborn.
sentences.cn: 思路与出路并存, 出路与财路孪生.

sentences.en: The monism that value decides and value distributive pluralism can coexist.
sentences.cn: 价值决定的一元论和价值分配的多元论可以并存.

sentences.en: The war started because the two countries couldn't coexist peacefully.
sentences.cn: 两国因为无法和平共处,所以爆发了战争.

sentences.en: To be more precise, Buddhism, Taoism and Confucianism coexist here.
sentences.cn: 准确地说呀, 应该是佛教 、 道教、儒教三教并存.

sentences.en: Two or more biosynthetic pathways may coexist in a single cell.
sentences.cn: 在同一细胞中可能同时存在两条或更多条生物合成途径.

sentences.en: We must coexist with them, but not let them take us over.
sentences.cn: 我们必须与之共存，但不要让它们将我们压垮。

trans.tran_en: if two different things coexist, they exist at the same time or in the same place
if two different things coexist, they exist at the same time or in the same place
